text: Brownstein is a surname of mixed origin. The name is composed of the English word "brown" and the German word "stein" (meaning "stone"). Notable people with the surname include: * Alec Brownstein (born 1980), American writer * Carrie Brownstein (born 1974), American musician and actress * Irwin Brownstein (1930–1996), New York politician and judge * Louis Brownstein, better known as Lew Brown (1893–1958), American lyricist ==See also== * Braunstein * Brownstone (surname) * Bronstein Category:Jewish surnames Category:Yiddish-language surnames
title: Brownstein
